body.name: Desktop Mini Tripod, TecoFill Tabletop Tripod with 360° Panoramic Metal Ball Head, Compact Metal Phone Tripod for Camera Vlogging, Compatible with DSLR/Mirroless/Gopro/LED Light, Max Load: 11lb
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 54 mins
features: 🌟【Robust and Secure】Crafted from high-quality all-aluminum alloy, this mini tripod effortlessly supports up to 5kg/11lb, ensuring steady and secure shots in any situation.

🌟【Lightweight, Compact & Portable】Weighing just 248g and measuring 5.54.421cm, our small travel tripod is incredibly portable. Slip it into your bag for the perfect shot on the go, whether you're a photographer or a casual traveler.

🌟【Flexible Angle-Adjustment】Tailor your setup with adjustable leg angles (15 to 60 degrees) for adaptability to various terrains. Precision-engineered rubber feet prevent sliding or wobbling, providing stability in any scenario.

🌟【Creative Panoramic Ball Head】Unlock artistic potential with the 360-degree rotation capabilities of the metal ball head. Capture breathtaking panoramic and vertical shots, making it the ultimate vlogging tripod for content creators.

🌟【Wide Connection & Expansion】Versatility is key with the 1/4" screw hole and cold shoe expansion port. Accommodate DSLRs, mirrorless cameras, smartphones, GoPros, and LED lights simultaneously. Configure your perfect setup for any shooting scenario with utmost precision and creativity. (Note: Adhere to weight limits and avoid using SLRs for vertical shots.) Your all-in-one small camera tripod solution.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 1 rating 5.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TecoFill Mini Tripod - Aluminium Alloy with 360° Panoramic Metal Ball Head Lightweight & Robust: the Angle of the foot tube can be adjusted (15 degrees to 60 degrees), easy to fold; Rubber foot nails prevent slidingDual-Use: the design of this tripod head combines cold shoe mount adapter and a 1/4" standard threaded screw in the top of the ball head, which supports two different mounting methods of your devices. All you need to do is detaching it and flipping to the other side.Extra Expansion: apart from the cold shoe mount on top of the ball head, an extra cold shoe mount is designed on the side of the ball head, which allows you to mount more than one devices on one tripod head such as microphone, cell phone or LED video light.360-degree Panorama: release the pan base knob, you are able to rotate the tripod head base smoothly.

2-In-1 Mounting Option The versatile ball head, equipped with an integrated 1/4" screw cold shoe mount, easily transforms into a cold shoe adapter with a flip. It caters to a variety of devices, from smartphones and action cameras to camcorders, making setup a breeze and ideal for quick-release tripod mounts Smooth Swiveling Experience the TecoFill ball head's exceptional smoothness in motion. Engineered with precision, it allows for effortless swirling movements, ensuring seamless transitions for precise shot composition 360-Degree Rotatable Pan Base The rotatable pan base of our ball head offers seamless 360-degree rotation, providing photographers with unparalleled flexibility and precision in capturing dynamic shots. Effortlessly pivot and frame your subjects with the smooth and responsive rotation of our innovative pan base, ensuring you never miss the perfect angle
Product Specification: Main Material Aluminum-Alloy Item Weight 249g Item Size 5*4.4*21cm Max Load 11lbs/4.5KG Ball Head Size 5.5 * 3.8 * 6.1cm/ 2.2 * 1.5 * 2.4inch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel vlogging
reviews.reviewText: This small item exceeded my expectations. As a travel vloger, I truly don't want to have many extra stuff on the train or plane, nither do I want to carry an extra bag to have my gear. Here comes a perfect companion. Its lightweight and compact design make it the perfect companion for my vlogging adventures, fitting easily into my bag without compromising on stability. The most increadible part is the convertible tripod head, which contains two design of cold shoe, supporting extra devices such as my fill light and microphone, so that I can accomplish my videos in one gear. This absulotely is a worthwhile tripod, can't be satisfy more with my purchase.
